metadata.synopsis: A loner who spends his time volunteering for meals on wheels meets an intriguing girl who becomes his best friend. When he discovers that she's in a relationship with her stepfather, he becomes obsessed with idea of saving her.

reviews: It's an odd movie to be sure, both creepy and sweet at times, and it's certainly fun to watch.
simply doesn't make enough logical sense to justify its third act histrionics
Full of absurd visual humor and an ending that made me jump out of my seat even though I could see it coming a mile away.
What works beautifully are all the moments of black comedy that give flavor, but don't necessarily build upon the film's themes.
